        Asserts that a request is authorized to be executed, and if not, throws an exception to indicate the filter chain should not continue.

      • assertSecure

        protected void assertSecure(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                     throws OauthException
        Asserts that the OAuth token request is secure as mandated by https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749#section-3.2, and if not, throws an appropriate OauthException.

        This implementation delegates to isSecureConnectionRequired(request,response), and if not secure, throws an exception with an appropriate message, otherwise this method returns quietly.

        Parameters:
        request - inbound request
        response - outbound response
        Throws:
        OauthException - if the request is not secure.

      • isSecureConnectionRequired

        protected boolean isSecureConnectionRequired(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                             javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)

        OauthException
